title: Janna/Soraka/Lulu mains disgust me
body:
Nami mains too.

They don't deserve end of Season Rewards. Or at the very least, they should get rewards from 2 tiers below where the finish. Fucking scumbag ward bitch supports. Pathetic. I have no respect for any of them.

Oh, you're Diamond? wait nvm you main Janna. wait nvm you have a negative win rate and it took you 2000 games to get there.

Pathetic sacks of shit please uninstall.
